author: alberto-sanchez
body:
#### PR description:

Update to EvtGen 2.0.0 and cleanup of unneeded user decay models.
Tables copied from release were update, as well as fragments

it should be integrated together with cms-sw/cmsdist#6494

#### PR validation:

Py8_tt_evtgen1_cfg.py, Py8_bplus_evtgen1_cfg.py, and Py8_lambadb_evtgen1_Lb2plnuLCSR_cfg.py has sucesfully run as well as 

runTheMatrix.py -l 541.0,545.0 --command='-n 100' 

which test the BPH fragments and runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos
title: Update to evtgen 2.0
